text:
After instal W2K Advanced server SP4 (clean) Apache run without problems, nut 
after applying new MS Patches Apache won't start and edn with error message :
C:\Apache Group\Apache2\bin>apache
Syntax error on line 142 of C:/Apache Group/Apache2/conf/httpd.conf:
Cannot load C:/Apache Group/Apache2/modules/mod_autoindex.so into server: Invali
d access to memory location.
creator: tomi@isptlan.dyndns.org

text: Does this happen with the latest Apache release (2.0.52) ?
